title: Looking for High Plat+ Top for Team
body:
Hello Summoner,

We are a newly created team that focuses around entering tournaments (Like OOL) and Improving as a team.
Our team is about high plat - diamond ranking over all and we need an available top that can work well with the team.

Requirements:

- Plat 3+
- Microphone
- Large Champion Pool (Not a 1 trick)
- Not Toxic! Be a team player
- Available for tournaments and scrims

If interested please add  'Hnp Dawg' in game or leave a comment below!

Hope to hear from you soon~
